title: Peanut, Chilli and Ginger Noodles
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) fresh Chinese noodles', '100ml (4 fl oz) chicken stock', '1 1/2 tablespoons minced fresh root ginger', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '3 tablespoons unsweetened peanut butter', '1 1/2 tablespoons honey', '1 dessertspoon hot chilli paste (optional)', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '4 spring onions, chopped', '30g (1 oz) chopped peanuts']
